name: Ghegy's Adventure
description:
Ghegy is the birthday girl of the day, but her life change in a moment: she is convinced that she lives on Earth, but she'll return to the world she comes from very soon... Welcome to Ghezalandia Town!

Why is she here? Why was her on Earth? Why there's a Pokémon called Hamburgasaur that follows her everywhere she goes?

Here starts the adventure! Discover the secrets of Ghezalandia Town's people, look for the legendary lost Pokémon and discover the truth behind the treasures.
